channel.title: [317] How Do I Add Custom Items? [317]
channel.description:
I have been looking over all google on how to add custom items and i cant seem to find a tutorial about it! I need help trying to add custom items! I heard that you can change any item that you want in the game to any color, also that you can make up your own items! please help me!
If your asking to PM you or something like that there's no point, you mise well let everyone know how to do this!
Thanks, ipwnu2day
;) :cool: :rolleyes: :confused:

item.title: [317] How Do I Add Custom Items? [317]
item.dc:creator: @ipwnu2day ipwnu2day
item.description:
@ipwnu2day wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:2, topic:373026”]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363483.0.html
Say thank you.[/quote]

Thank You, My Problem Is Solved!
